title: Hearing Your Voice!
detail_text: <:th_ch0211/>Hmm......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Lanzhu, what are you glaring at on your smartphone screen?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>I‚Äôm waiting.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Waiting?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata-chan‚Äôs waiting, too~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Whoa! Don‚Äôt surprise me like that, Kanata!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Ehehe, sorry~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>So, what are we waiting for?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Everyone‚Äôs reactions~ùÖ†<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Ahhh!! Come on! Don‚Äôt scare me like that, Emma... Wait, everyone‚Äôs here!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Busted. Ai-san wanted to surprise Miachi too.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Darn it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>You noticed us faster than expected.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>We should‚Äôve planned better.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Hey! Why am I the only one who doesn‚Äôt know anything?!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Geez, Miako, you‚Äôre always cooped up in your room. You don‚Äôt even know what today is, do you?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Mia-chan, here, a calendar.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>A calendar...? Ah!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Seems like you finally realized.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Today is the release date of our new song, Mia-san!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I see... That‚Äôs what you mean by waiting...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>That‚Äôs right! We‚Äôre waiting for everyone who listened to post their thoughts!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Ah, everyone! Look at this!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Wait, wait, let me see too~~~~!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
